sources.title: Aggie Appleby, Maker of Men
sources.description: Title: Aggie Appleby, Maker of Men Summary: When Aggie's boyfriend Red is sent to jail, she meets a mild-mannered man and decides to turn him into a real man. Directed by: Mark Sandrich Actors: Charles Farrell, Wynne Gibson, William Gargan Production Company: RKO Radio Pictures Release Date: 3 November 1933 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 When Aggie's boyfriend Red is sent to jail, she meets a mild-mannered man and decides to turn him into a real man.

metadata.Plot: When Aggie's boyfriend Red is sent to jail, she meets a mild-mannered man and decides to turn him into a real man.
metadata.Writer: Joseph Kesselring, Humphrey Pearson, Edward Kaufman
metadata.Actors: Charles Farrell, Wynne Gibson, William Gargan
